verses.verse: For <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> I <S%H5414>considered<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart<s%> even to <S%H952>declare<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%> that the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and their <S%H5652>works,<s%> are in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> <S%H1571>either<s%> <S%H160>love<s%> or <S%H8135>hatred<s%> by <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

<S%H3605>All<s%> things come <S%H834>alike<s%> to <S%H3605>all:<s%> there is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4745>event<s%> to the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and to the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> to the <S%H2896>good<s%> and to the <S%H2889>clean,<s%> and to the <S%H2931>unclean;<s%> to him that <S%H2076>sacrifices,<s%> and to him that <S%H2076>sacrifices<s%> not: as is the <S%H2896>good,<s%> so is the <S%H2398>sinner;<s%> and he that <S%H7650>swears,<s%> as he that <S%H3373>fears<s%> an <S%H7621>oath.<s%>

<S%H2088>This<s%> is an <S%H7451>evil<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> things that are <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> that there is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4745>event<s%> to <S%H3605>all:<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H1947>madness<s%> is in their <S%H3824>heart<s%> while they <S%H2416>live,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> that they go to the <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

For to him that is <S%H977>joined<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> there is <S%H986>hope:<s%> for a <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H3611>dog<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> a <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H738>lion.<s%>

For the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that they shall <S%H4191>die:<s%> but the <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> not <S%H3972>any<s%> thing, <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H369><s%> have they any <S%H5750>more<s%> a <S%H7939>reward;<s%> for the <S%H2143>memory<s%> of them is <S%H7911>forgotten.<s%>

<S%H1571>Also<s%> their <S%H160>love,<s%> and their <S%H8135>hatred,<s%> and their <S%H7068>envy,<s%> is <S%H3528>now<s%> <S%H6>perished;<s%> <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H369><s%> have they any <S%H5750>more<s%> a <S%H2506>portion<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> thing that is <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

<S%H3212>Go<s%> your way, <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> with <S%H8057>joy,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> your <S%H3196>wine<s%> with a <S%H2896>merry<s%> <S%H3820>heart;<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3528>now<s%> <S%H7521>accepts<s%> your <S%H4639>works.<s%>
Let your <S%H899>garments<s%> be <S%H3605>always<s%> <S%H6256><s%> <S%H3836>white;<s%> and let your <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H2637>lack<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H8081>ointment.<s%>

<S%H2416>Live<s%> <S%H2416>joyfully<s%> with the <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of your <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H1892>vanity:<s%> for that is your <S%H2506>portion<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2416>life,<s%> and in your <S%H5999>labor<s%> which you <S%H6001>take<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

<S%H3605>Whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H4672>finds<s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> it with your <S%H3581>might;<s%> for there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4639>work,<s%> nor <S%H2808>device,<s%> nor <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> nor <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> in the <S%H7585>grave,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H1980>go.<s%>

I <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> that the <S%H4793>race<s%> is not to the <S%H7031>swift,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> to the <S%H1368>strong,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1571>yet<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1571>yet<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%> to men of <S%H995>understanding,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1571>yet<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> to men of <S%H3045>skill;<s%> but <S%H6256>time<s%> and <S%H6294>chance<s%> <S%H7136>happens<s%> to them <S%H3605>all.<s%>

For <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> not his <S%H6256>time:<s%> as the <S%H1709>fishes<s%> that are <S%H270>taken<s%> in an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4686>net,<s%> and as the <S%H6833>birds<s%> that are <S%H270>caught<s%> in the <S%H6341>snare;<s%> <S%H1992>so<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H3369>snared<s%> in an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> when it <S%H5307>falls<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> on them.
<S%H2090>This<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> have I <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> and it seemed <S%H1419>great<s%> to me:

There was a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> within it; and there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> it, and <S%H5437>besieged<s%> it, and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4685>bulwarks<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it:

Now there was <S%H4672>found<s%> in it a <S%H4542>poor<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and he by his <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H4422>delivered<s%> the <S%H5892>city;<s%> yet <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> that <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H4542>poor<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H1369>strength:<s%> nevertheless the <S%H4542>poor<s%> man's <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H959>despised,<s%> and his <S%H1697>words<s%> are not <S%H8085>heard.<s%>
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2450>wise<s%> men are <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H5183>quiet<s%> more than the <S%H2201>cry<s%> of him that <S%H4910>rules<s%> among <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
